questions.question: Which peninsula is home to the countries of Spain and Portugal?
The Scandinavian Peninsula is primarily shared by which two countries?
Italy is located on which peninsula, shaped like a boot?
The Arabian Peninsula is the world's largest peninsula. Which country occupies most of it?
The Yucatan Peninsula, known for Mayan ruins, is located in which country?
Which peninsula separates the Sea of Japan from the Yellow Sea?
The Balkan Peninsula includes which of these countries?
The Sinai Peninsula connects which two continents?
Florida is a large peninsula that extends into which body of water?
options: Both the Atlantic Ocean and Gulf of Mexico

questions.question: The Kamchatka Peninsula, known for its volcanoes, belongs to which country?

The Jutland Peninsula forms the mainland of which European country?
